name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @lenikacruz: “With BTS, the only constant is their duality—they’re “local” yet global, industry outsiders on the inside, equally skilled at intimacy and pageantry.” I asked @BTS_twt about how they made the most of a difficult year: 

https://t.co/P56TjKOEeV

name: TheAtlantic
text: With @BTS_twt, the only constant is their duality—they’re Korean yet global, industry outsiders on the inside, equally skilled at intimacy and spectacle. @lenikacruz talked with the artists about how they made the most of a difficult year: https://t.co/upAwL3BfuT

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @lenikacruz: i love how jungkook saying they can perform “louder than bombs” live is my version of a scoop https://t.co/BLyWXCqza3

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The Other Latif," "Nice White Parents," "Home Cooking," "Boom/Bust: The Rise and Fall of HQ Trivia," and more. @LJStandley and @McQuadeEric pick the 50 best podcasts of 2020. https://t.co/VZO1XDeYZw

name: TheAtlantic
text: "If 2020 were a person, what sort of punishment would they deserve? And given the sensible prohibitions against torture in human-rights law, what would be the next best option?" @conor64 writes: https://t.co/EsN0iusx5l

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Despite the miracle of multiple vaccines being researched, authorized, and injected in record time, many Americans will still die of the coronavirus before they can get vaccinated," @Craig_A_Spencer writes: https://t.co/AYchYFgSp9

name: TheAtlantic
text: Some evidence has suggested that taking melatonin could help slow COVID-19. But the real key may be sleep itself, @jameshamblin reports: https://t.co/gJ1BE3iANE

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Transcendent Kingdom," “Uncanny Valley,” “A Burning,” and more: The Atlantic's writers and editors choose their favorite books of the year. https://t.co/WVVFmHC1Ia

name: TheAtlantic
text: The director of "Up" and "Inside Out" has made another cerebral adventure with Pixar's "Soul," an ambitious animated tale about the meaning of existence, @davidlsims writes: https://t.co/HnGkuZksRb
